cmg.cnsim.bitcoin

Class BitcoinReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmg.cnsim.engine.Reporter
      • cmg.cnsim.bitcoin.BitcoinReporter

  • public class BitcoinReporter
extends Reporter
    Handles reporting for Bitcoin simulators in addition to the reports generated by the engine's Reporter, which it extends. This specialized reporter reports also on: 1. The state of the blockchain (block IDs sequences and orphans). 2. THe state of the block (various information). To be used from e.g., within BitcoinBlock for more specific reporting.
    Author:
    Sotirios Liaskos for the Conceptual Modeling Group @ York University`

      • reportBlockChainState

        public static void reportBlockChainState(java.lang.String[] blockchain,
                                         java.lang.String[] orphans)
        Adds a line to the blockhain state report.
        Parameters:
        blockchain - A string showing the state of the blockchain (e.g., a list of block IDs).
        orphans - A string showing the state of the orphans (e.g., a list of block IDs).
